H0.text: who was the son of king leonidas. Aristodemus

H1.text: who was the son of king leonidas. Agesilaus II

H2.text: who was the son of king leonidas. Cleomenes I

H3.text: who was the son of king leonidas. Pleistarchus

A4.text: Pleistarchus' father King Leonidas perished in 480 BC at the Battle of Thermopylae.

A5.text: Pleistarchus was born as a prince, likely the only son of King Leonidas I and Queen Gorgo.

A6.text: His grandparents were Kings Anaxandridas II and Cleomenes I.
